div.pre: 1823 Ai-Khanum, in anc. Bactria, Afgha- nistan, 1970 Burial: c. 170 B.C.? Contents: 682 AR. From excavations Agathocles: 6 dr. (bilingual) Indian punch-marked: 676 Disposition: Kabul Audoin-Bernard, Comptes rendus de l'Acad√©mie des Inscriptions 1971, pp. 435-46, illus.
